Text:
function RIR_EP04_23()
    -- .エピローグ
    SaveData.Title = "エピローグ"

    -- //BG：繁華街（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG004ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ At the very same time Minato and Lira were united―― ]])

    -- //BU：素顔３号先輩
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_SM301ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0086.wav")
    MSG([[
    【???】Bare Face #3
 "Just as ordered, I've found Lira Hoozuki." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0087.wav")
    MSG([[
    【???】Bare Face #3
 "And luckily, I found some material perfect for your usual intimidation. I wanna have them reconsider how they treat us a bit." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0086.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "Oh my~<sprite="Emoji" name="star"> What a wonderful job you did~ Aside from that useless Daria, giving orders was definitely the right call~" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0087.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "I'll consider improving your treatment too, so be sure to ask your family for cooperation." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0088.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "We’ll focus our target solely on Lira Hoozuki. That ungrateful one must regret it thoroughly." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0088.wav")
    MSG([[
    【???】Bare Face #3
 "Hey hey, you planning to drag in the Houou Group too? You're really obsessed with this academy, huh." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0089.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "...Silence. Anyone who interferes with my plan, I won’t spare even a single bitch." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0090.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "The era where such a ‘fake’ gets praised will end. By the hand of Nemesia Himegami, certainly." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    -- 　　　　◆

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000", 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RIR_EP05_01")
end
